titleStmt.title: A vindication of the baptized churches from the calumnies of Mr. Michael Harrison, of Potters Pury in Northampton-shire. Being an answer to his two books, intituled, Infant baptism God's ordinance. By William Russel, M.D. A lover of primitive Christianity.
titleStmt.author: Russel, William, d. 1702.

notesStmt.note: Includes: The epistle of the author to Mr. Michael Harrison .. .
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
